name: LKQ European Holdings B.V.
goal: LKQ Europe is the leading distributor of vehicles replacement parts, materials, equipment and services to independent garages and body shops in Europe. LKQ Europe operates in 21 countries and is a subsidiary of LKQ Corporation with activities in North America, Europe, India and Taiwan. As a key player in the supply chain for competitive and safe vehicle spare parts in benefit of the European citizens, LKQ supports the proposal of the European commission to foster a free movement of goods across Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Environment, International co-operation and development, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: We follow the initiatives to Design Protection as well as to Access to Car generated Data and Autonomous Driving,
